2+1.sig_info: Dormammu uses his opponent's powers as a link to reach deep within their soul. Each time a buff expires on his opponent Dormammu has up to a 100% chance to Degenerate them for 40 to 104.01 direct damage, over 10 seconds. The chance of this ability triggering increases the longer it's been since it was last triggered.
